title: - ++Charming 4 bedroom, 2 bath home available+++
posting_body: Harvard Ave, Wow, what an opportunity!
This character home in Cleveland has been beautifully renovated nearly to completion, but it needs someone to bring it to the finish line.
This is a great opportunity for an investor or for an owner occupant looking to add instant equity.
It needs a little work to finish, but it's is an incredible value with your sweat equity.
This 4 bedroom home offers new windows, new siding, fresh neutral paint and flooring throughout - there is so much potential.
Call me to schedule your showing today!
Contact us directly and learn more, text!!!!!!
